mapper.sql: id, sacp_id, course_name, course_avatar, descr, classify_id, classify_name, forum_id, create_time, modify_time, learner_number, reply_number, is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from course_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into course_info (id, sacp_id, course_name, course_avatar, descr, classify_id, classify_name, forum_id, create_time, modify_time, learner_number, reply_number, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sacpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forumId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{learnerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT})

update course_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sacp_id = #{record.sacpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_name = #{record.courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
course_avatar = #{record.courseAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sacp_id = #{sacpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update course_info set sacp_id = #{sacpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_name = #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_avatar = #{courseAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_id = #{classifyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, forum_id = #{forumId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, learner_number = #{learnerNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reply_number = #{replyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from course_info where sacp_id = #{sacpId} and is_delete=0 order by create_time desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
select * from course_info where classify_id = #{classifyId} and is_delete=0 order by create_time desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
